column2: Kenya-Ruto: Icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu aravuga ku kubuzwa urugendo
column3: Icegera c'umukuru wa Kenya William Ruto avuga ko ingingo  y'abategetsi yo kumubuza   gufata urugendo rwo kuja mu  gihugu kibanyi ca Uganda ari integuro yo kumutera umutima mubi nk'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu no kubangamira ivyo yifuza gushikako muri poritike. Mu kiganiro n'iradiyo yo muri Kenya (Inooro FM) mu gitondo co kuri uyu wa gatatu, William Ruto yavuze ko muri kahise yari amaze gufata ingendo z'akazi canke ziwe bwite ata ntambamyi. Yasiguye ko urugendo rwiwe rwari rugamije kwigira ku kigega c'ubutunzi muri  Uganda mu ntumbero y'umugambi w'ubutunzi  aherutse gutanguza wa 'Bottoms Up' - ugamije guteza imbere ubuzima bw'abantu baronka amikoro make nk'inzira yo kuzamura ubutunzi bwa Kenya. Abajijwe igituma umukuru w'igihugu ata na kimwe yari azi kuri urwo rugendo, Ruto yaciye yigovyora mu kubaza ngo: ''Urazi neza ko umukuru w'igihugu atarwo yari azi?' Harun Aydin ajemwo gute? Ruto yabandanije avuga ko mu myaka icenda amaze ari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu atari bwigere asabwa kubanza gusaba uruhusha ku ngendo ziwe zo hanze  y'igihugu, aca anibaza igituma ivyo bishitse ubu. Ruto  yanatanze umuco ku muntu aturuka muri Turkiya, Harun Aydin yari  ku rutonde rw'abo bari kujana muri urwo  rugendo. Yavuze ko Aydin ari umugwizatunga afise imitahe muri Kenya, akaba anashaka kwagurira ibikorwa vyiwe muri Uganda na Tanzania. Umwidondoro n'ubutumwa bw'uwo mugwizatunga vyatumye hari ibibazo vyibazwa biranavugwa cane mu binyamakuru bitandukanye mu gihugu. Icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yavuze ko ari ''ugusara hamwe na poritike itagira agaciro'' gufata uwo munyamahanga nk'uwokekwa kuba uwukora iterabwoba  ata kindi kibitumye atari uko yari amuherekeje. Ku wa mbere, inyuma yo kurindira amasaha   atatu kugira yemerewe gufata urugendo, icegera c'umukutu w'igihugu yahavuye abuzwa kwurira indege yo kuja muri Uganda. Amategeko ya reta ya Kenya asaba abakozi  bakuru  ba reta gusaba uruhusha umukuru w'akazi ka reta imbere yo  gufata ingendo zo  mu bindi bihugu - ariko kubuza icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu gufata urugendo ntaho  vyari bwigere  biba. Umukuru wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta n'icegera ciwe ntibagifitaniye ubucuti bari bafitaniye bagitangura amabanga yo kurongora igihugu mu 2013. Ubwo bucuti bwabo bwatosekaye kuva umunsi Prezida Uhuru Kenyatta akorana mu minwe n'uwutavuga  rumwe na reta Raila Odinga mu 2018. Kuva ico gihe icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yaciye aba nk'uwushizwe ku ruhande mu bikorwa vy'icese vya reta. Umutegetsi wo muri reta ya Uganda Duncan Abigaba, yari asanzwe ariwe ahuza ibikorwa vy'urugendo rw'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu,  yemereye BBC ko  vy'ukuri Ruto yari yitezwe muri Uganda mu butumwa bwiwe bwite. Yasiguye ko Ruto hari inyungu arondera mu gisata c'uburimyi bw'urudandazwa no gukorera ku mugambi wiwe wo  kuri kaminuza ya Makerere wo gushinga igisata c'ivyigwa vy'uburongozi, the Dr.William Samoei Ruto Centre for Leadership. Mu kwezi guheze icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yahagarariye itanguza rw'uruganda rw'urucanco muri Uganda ku butumire bwa prezida Yoweri Museveni. Ariko ubushikiranganji bwa Uganda bujejwe imigenderanire bwavuze ko ata rugendo rw'icegera c'umukuru wa Kenya bwari buzi. Ministre wa reta ajejwe imigenderanire, Oryem Okello yasiguye ko urwo rugendo rutamenyeshejwe ubushikiranganji bwiwe kandi ko n'abakira abashitsi batari biteguriye umuzo wiwe.

column2: Umugwi wa ONU uvuga ko agateka ka muntu mu Burundi kagihonyangwa
column3: Umugwi wigenga wa ONU wo gutohoza ku mabi ahonyanga agateka ka zina muntu mu Burundi uvuga ko n'ubwo umukuru w'igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye yiyemeje guteza imbera ako gateza ngo n'ubu nta ngingo zifadika zirafatwa muri iyo nzira. Doudou Diene arongoye uwo mugwi umaze imyaka itanu yabivugiye mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku munsi  uwo mugwi wari uramutse ushira ahabona icegeranyo cawo kigira gatanu. Mw'ijambo ry'intangamarara, Doudou Diene yavuze ko "inyuma y'igisa n'uko ibintu vyasubiye mu buryo, amabi akomeye yo guhonyanga agateka ka zina muntu abandanya mu gihugu". Reta y'Uburundi yagumye ihakana ivyegeranyo uwo mugwi wagiye urasohora ivuga ko ari ibinyoma kandi bifise intumbero ya poritike. Uwo mugwi uvuga ko kuva Prezida Ndayishimiye ashitse ku butegetsi haraheze amezi 15 "uretse ko amabi akomeye cane yabandanije akorwa, ku mpande zimwe zimwe, ibintu vyarunyutse". Uwo mugwi utanga akarorero k'abantu bo mugambwe utavuga rumwe na reta, CNL, abahoze mu gisirikare ca kera bagwiriyemwo abatusti  na bamwe mu bahungutse bafashwe n'abajejwe umutekano bagirizwa gukorana n'abitwaje ibigwanisho kuva aho hagabiwe ibitero mu kwezi kw'umunani mu 2020. Umugwi uvuga ko bamwe "bishwe ata rubanza baciriwe, abandi baburirwa irengero, abandi nabo barapfungwa ata mategeko akurikijwe". Uwo mugwi uvuga ko n'ubwo icuka ca poritike casa n'icabaye ciza inyuma y'amatora yo mu 2020, ukutihanganira abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi n'ubu bigikomeye cane. N'aho hatangwa akarorero ku banywanyi b'umugambwe CNL babandanya gukorerwa amabi atandukanye harimwo kuburwa irengero, gufatwa bidaciye mu mategeko no kuborezwa igufa na cane cane kuva mu kwezi kwa gatandatatu mu 2021. Abagirizwa ayo mabi basa n'abasanzwe bavugwa mu bindi vyegeranyo. N'abo mu rwego rw'iperereza, abapolisi, hamwe n'imbonerakure, urwaruka rw'umugwambwe uri ku butegetsi. Umugwi uvuga ko abakora ayo mabi batigera babibazwa imbere y'ubutungane hanyuma ngo babihanirwe. Abagize uwo mugwi ntibigeze bashika mu Burundi gukora amatohoza yabo. Yishura kuri ico kibazo, Françoise Hampson, icegera c'umukuru w'uwo mugwi yavuze ko  badashobora kuja mu gihugu reta yaco itabahaye uruhusha. Ariko yemeza ko ubuhinga bwa none bwatumye bashobora kuvugana n'abakozweko n'amahano atandukanye bari mu Burundi. Umugwi ugaruka ku bamenyeshamakuru bane b'ikinyamakuru Iwacu bafunguwe mu kwezi kwa 12 mu 2020 ku kigongwe c'umukuru w'igihugu, gusa ngo ntivyigeze bivugwa ko bari bafashwe bazira gukora umwuga wabo. Hari n'abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu barekuwe harimwo Germain Rukuki. Gusa uwo mugwi uvuga ko ivyo ari ibimenyetso gusa. Muri rusangi uvuga ko ubucamanza bugikoreshwa n'ubutegetsi nk'igikoresho co gucinyiza abatavuga rumwe nabwo, hakongerako ibiturire vyabumugaje na reta ubwayo iherutse kwiyemerera. Muri iyo myaka itanu umaze ukora, ivyeregaranyo vyawo vyagumye vyiyamirizwa na reta y'Uburundi. Françoise Hampson avuga ko akazi k'umugwi ujejwe gukora amatohoza atari ako guhindura ibintu. Avuga ati: "Umugwi ujejwe gutohoza no gushira ahabona mu buryo buzira akanenge bushoboka ingene ibintu biba vyifashe", akongerako ko hari izindi nzego zijejwe gukoresha ivyegeranyo umugwi wasohoye kugirango ibintu bihinduke. Doudou Diene nawe amwunganira avuga ati "Twari dusigaye turi urwego rwigenga rumwe rwonyene rwakurikirana ibibera mu Burundi" kuko izindi nzego zose zabikora reta y'Uburundi yashoboye kuzicecekesha. Avuga ko ikintu gihambaye kwari ugushobora guha ijambo "abakorewe amabi kuko akenshi iyo abo batavuze" bica bimera nk'uko ayo mabi atakozwe. Reta y'Uburundi yasavye kuva kera ko uwo mugwi wovaho. Wari umaze imyaka itanu uguma wongerwa ikiringo. Ingingo ya kazoza kawo izofatwa mu nama y'urwego rwa ONU rujejejwe agateka ka zina muntu iriko iraba muri uku kwezi kw'icenda. Nihanaho hazoshiririzwa icese ico cegeranyo gishasha. Françoise Hampson avuga ko abagize uwo mugwi atari bo bisabira  ko umugwi wabo ubandanya canke urangirizwa ikiringo. Bikorwa n'ibihugu bigize urwo rwego. Gusa avuga ko ''amakungu akeneye urwego rwo kuguma rushinze ijisho ibibera mu Burundi".

column2: Tanzania: Patiri imbere y'ubutungane yagirizwa vya mfura mbi yakoreye abana
column3: Umupatiri wa Ekleziya Katolika mu buraruko bwa Tanzania yarengukishijwe imbere y’ubutungane yagirizwa ivya mfura mbi yakoreye abana, nk’uko bivugwa n’igipolisi. Aba bana ni abanyeshure bo kuva mu mwaka wa gatandatu gushika mu mwaka wa mbere w’ishure ryisumbuye bariko bitegurira gusangira, abandi gukomezwa. Umunyamabanga mukuru w’Inama nkuru y’Abepiskopi muri Tanzania, Patiri Charles Kitima, avuga ko Ekleziya izokorana n’ababijejwe kugira ngo ubutungane bukore muri uru rubanza. Patiri Kitima ati: “Twavuze ko turindiriye iyo ngingo [ya sentare] kugira ngo izindi ngingo zifatwe...ivyemezo ni bitangwe hanyuma nawe ahabwe akaryo ko kwiregura, ico nico turindiriye. “Ni ngombwa ko amategeko akora igikorwa cayo kandi Ekleziya izokwifatanya n’ababijejwe kugira ngo abakorewe ikibi batunganirizwe”. Patiri Kitima yabwiye BBC ko muri rusangi Ekleziya Katorika irwanya ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina rikorerwa abana kuko isengero ritegerezwa kuba ikibanza c’amahoro kuri bose. Ati: “Reka twemere ko iki ari ikibazo kijanye na kamere ya nyene kubikora, dufise abapatiri barenga 3.000 muri kino gihugu ariko muri bo harimwo abo usanga bafise utunenge n’intege nke, ivyo bibaho”. Patiri Kitima avuga ko iki ari akabi kabishe kuko gituma abavyeyi n’abana bagira impungenge nyinshi, abana iyo bagiye mu bikorwa nk’ivyo baba bizeye ko bagiye guhura n’umuntu yari kubarera muri mutima. Ati: “Rero iyo bakorewe ibitabajanye ni ibintu bibabaza cane. “Twebwe nka Ekleziya turababazwa n’ingeso mbi z’umuntu umw’umwe ziteye kubiri kubiri n’ico twategerezwa kwubaka, kwubaka umuntu mu mico myiza. “Ureste ko iki ari igicumuro kandi kibabaza Imana, gifise n’ingaruka mbi ku bana, rero ni ngombwa ko hafatwa ingingo ruhasha”. Patiri Kitima avuga ko kw’isi abantu nk’abo bahari, ko rero dutegerezwa gufashanya nk’abanya muryango mu guhindura izo ngeso, kandi tugatanga inkuru iyo hari ikintu nk’iki kibaye. Avuga ko uburyo bwo gutanga inkuru muri Ekleziya butomoye, kuva hasi gushika hejuru ku Nama nkuru y’abepiskopi, abantu b’abahinga mu gutorera inyishu ibibazo nk’ivyo.

column2: Umupasitori aregwa gusambanya umukenyezi ku nguvu muri Nigeria yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yo kurongora ishengero.
column3: Uyo mupastori asayangana , Biodun Fatoyinbo yari amaze imisi avugwa mu makuru iyi misi itatu iheze, inyuma yaho umukenyezi azwi cane mu gufata amafoto amwagiririje ko yamusambanije ku nguvu incuro zibiri imbere y'uko ashikana imyaka cumi n'umunani, haheze imyaka irenga cumi. Uyo mu pastori w'ishengero bita COZA rikundwa cane mu gisagara Abuja yanditse ku rubuga ngurukana bumenyi rwa Instagram kuri uyu musi wa mbere  ko yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera iyo nkuru yavuzwe cane. Hari abari bakoze  imyiyerekano mu mpera z'iyindwi mu bisagara bikuru bibiri vy'igihugu ca Nigeria arivyo Lagos na  Abuja. Basabira  ubutungane Busola Dakolo inyuma yaho amasanamu y'uwo mukenyezi  akwiragirijwe cane  ku mbuga  ngurukana bumenyi , avuga ko uyo mupastori yamusambanije ku nguvu. Uyo mu pastori wewe arabihakana. Igipolisi camenyesheje ko kitaramenya ibirego umukenyezi Dakolo yagirije uyo mu pastori  kandi ko ata muntu n'umwe arashikana ibirego nk'ivyo imbere y'ababijejwe. Igihugu ca Nigeria gifise abapastori benshi b'amasengero yemera Kristu y'abapentekoti, bamwe mu bapastori bakunze kwagirizwa kugira  inyifato itabereye.

column2: CECAFA U 23: Umumenyereza w'ikipe y'u Burundi avuga ko gushika muri 1/2 bitari vyoroshe
column3: Umumenyereza w'ikipe y'u Burundi y'abari munsi y'imyaka 23 avuga yuko umukino wabahaye itike yo kuja mu ca kabiri c'ihiganwa rya CECAFA bayikuye kure. Jimmy Ndayizeye yavuze yuko abakinyi biwe bategerejwe gukora iyo bwabaga kugira bikure imbere ya Ethiopia bakanganya 1-1. U Burundi bwari bukeneye inota rimwe gusa kugira burengane nyuma yo gutsinda Eritrea mu rukino rwa mbere ibitsindo 3-0. Umumenyereza Jimmy Ndayizeye yagize ati: "Novuga yuko rutari urukino rwari rworoshe kuri twebwe [...] Ethiopie kuva match itangura gushika ihere baturushije bakinira muri 'camp' yacu, hanyuma badutangura igitsindo ariko ntitwigeze ducika intege." Ikipe Intamba mu Rugamba yari ikeneye kunganya muri uru rukino kugira ibandanye mu ca kabiri c'ihiganwa, umumenyereza Ndayizeye akavuga ko ashimiria cane abakinyi biwe. Yagize ati: "Ndashimiye cane abakinyi banje ingene bashoboye gukina. Ni match twari dukeneyemwo inota rimwe kugira dushobore kurengana. Ni urukino rutari rworoshe." Mu ca kabiri c'ihiganwa u Burundi buzohura n'igihugu ca Kenya kandi umumenyereza Jimmy Ndayizeye aremera ko naho nyene bitazokworoha kuko ikipe ya Kenya ifise inguvu hamwe n'ubuhinga. Yagize ati: "Naragerageje kuraba uko bakina, tugiye kubikorerako muri entraînements nka zibiri tugiye gukora turabe yuko dushobora kubatsinda." Izi nkino za CECAFA z'abatarenza imyaka 23 zibera mu muji wa Bahir Dar mu gihugu ca Ethiopia.

column2: Iran: 'Nta gusubira inyuma' mu gihe imyiyerekano yujuje imisi 100
column3: Inyuma y’imisi ijana itanguye, imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ubutegetsi imaze igihe kirekire kuva habaye impinduka za ki-Islam muri Irani mu 1979 irahungabanije ubutegetsi ariko ku kiguzi kinini c’ubuzima bw’abantu imaze guhitana. Abarenga 500 bari muri yo, harimwo abana 69 baramaze kwicwa, nk’uko bivugwa n’ishirahamwe riharanira agateka ka zina muntu, Human Rights Activists' News Agency, HRANA. Babiri muri yo baramaze kunyongwa abandi nabo bababa 26 barindiriye igihano nk’ico, mu co ishirahamwe Amnesty International rivuga ko ari "imanza z’amanyanga". N’aho hari imyiyerekano yari imaze kuba muri kahise igahungabanya Irani – mu 2017 gushika mu ntango za 2018, hamwe n’iyindi yo muri Munyunyo (11) 2019 – iya kino gihe ntisanzwe, kuko ihuriyemwo abanyagihugu bo mu gihugu cose kandi abagore bakaba ari bo bafashe iya mbere ku civugo kivuga ngo “Abagore, Ubuzima, Ubwigenge”. Impande zompi zafashe umurongo utoroshe, ubutegetsi butuza abari muri yo, aho abadahunze bapfungwa, bakaborezwa igufa, abapfa bagapfa. Bamwe mu bihangange vya Irani bafashe ingingo zo gushigikira imyiyerekano, ivyatumye bafatwa canke bakomoka. Taraneh Alidoosti, umukinyi w’amareresi azwi cane, apfungiwe mw’ibohero rizwi cane rya Evin  inyuma yo kwiyamiriza inyongwa ry’umuyabaga yari mu myiyerekano. Imbere y’aha, uyu mugore yari yasohoye isanamu yiwe atambaye igitambara co kwitwikira mu mutwe nk’uko bitegerezwa, afise n’igicapo kiriko icivugo c’iyi myiyerekano. Asghar Farhadi yahagarariye Alidoosti mw’ireresi yiwe, The Salesman, yanditse ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "Narakoranye na Taraneh mu mareresi ane none ubu ari mw’ibohero kubera ashigikiye bagenziwe mu gihugu, be no kwiyamiriza imanza z’akarenganyo ziriko ziracibwa”. "Nimba kwerekana ko ushigikiye uwuharanira uburenganzira bwiwe ari icaha, ubwo rero amamiriyoni mirongo y’abanyagihugu muri kino gihugu ni abagizi ba nabi”. Uwundi mukinyi w’amareresi  azwi cane yahunze igihugu, Pegah Ahangarani yabwiye BBC ati: "Irani ntishobora gusubira mu gihe c’imbere ya Mahsa Amini", akaba ashaka kuvuga igihe c’umugore w’umunya-Iran iw’umu-kurde yapfiriye mw’ibohero ku wa 19 Nyakanga (9) bigaca bitera imyiyerekano. Hamid Farrokhnezhad, uwundi mukinyi w’amareresi w’umunya-Irani azwi cane, yahungiye muri Amerika muri kuno kwezi, avuga ko Indongozi y’ikirenga wa Irani, Ali Khamenei, ari "umutegetsi w’agahotoro". Amugereranya na Franco yahoze arongoye Espagne, Stalin yahoze arongoye Uburusiya, be na Mussolini yahoze arongoye Ubutaliyano, abo bose bakaba bazwi nk’abari barongoye intwaro mbi z’agahotoro. Ikindi kintu gitandukanya iyi myiyerekano n’iyabaye imbere y’aha, ni uko abri muri yo batanguye gukoresha vya biturika bihingurwa mu bitoro (cocktail Molotov). Ibi biherutse gukoreshwa ku birindiro vy’umurwi witwara gisirikare  Basija hamwe na Hawza, canke amashure y’idini yegukira abarongoye ishami rya Islam  ry’aba Shia. Umurwi uzwi nka Generation Z nawo warafashe iya mbere muri ino myiyerekano, mu kurenga ku mabwirizwa ruhasha y’idini itanguza ibindi bikorwa bisadanzwe nko guturira ibitambara vyo mu mutwe vyambarwa n’abategetsi b’aba-Islam. Uwundi murwi ugizwe n’urwaruka ni uwitwa "turban tossing" (twogereranya mu Kirundi na gukorora ibitambara) – aho abari muri wo bayomboka bagaca inyuma y’abategetsi b’Abashia, bagakubita ku bitambara vyabo bagaca biruka. Umusore w’imyaka 16, Arshia Emamgholizadeh, yarahagaritswe mu gisagara ca Tabriz  kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero mu kwezi guheze yagirizwa “gukorora igitambara”. Yapfunzwe imisi cumi imbere yo gupfungurwa. Haciye imisi ibiri, yariyahuye, ivyo umuryago wiwe uvuga ko vyatewe n’ingene yafashwe nabi mw’ibohero. Igihe yari apfunzwe, Arshia yarakubiswe amahiri yongera ahabwa n’ibinini bitazwi, nk’uko umwe mu begereye umuryango yabibwiye BBC igisata c’ururimi rw’igi perse. Mehran Samak w’imyaka 27 yararashwe mu mutwe mu gisagara ca Bandar Anzali kiri mu buraruko kubera yavugije ihona mu kwerekana umunezero igihe Irani itsindwa ikava mw’ihiganwa ry’igikombe c’isi yose, mu rukino rwabaye ku wa 29 Munyonyo. Gushika ubu, abagabo babiri ni bo bamaze kunyongwa inyuma yo kwagirwa n’ivyaha vyo guhungabanya umutekano bifatiye kuri ino myiyerekano,  mu co abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu bavuga ko ari amakosa akomeye y’ubucamanza. Abenshi mu bamaze gucirwa manza zo gupfa bavuga ko bakorewe iyica rubozo.

column2: Mu gihe Amerika iriko irungika izindi ngabo, Irani isaba ingabo mvamahanga kutegera ikigobe c’abarabu
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Irani aragabisha ko ingabo mvamahanga zihungabanya ikigobe c'Abarabu, inyuma y'aho Amerika imenyeshereje ko igiye kurungika ingabo muri ako karere. Perezida Hassan Rouhani avuga ko ingabo mvamahanga zamye "zitera umubabaro n'ubukene". Amerika ivuga ko igiye kurungika izindi ngabo mu gihugu ca Arabia Saoudite inyuma y'igitero giherutse kuba ku bigo bicukura igitoro, ivyo bihugu vyompi bikaba vyagirije Irani ko ari yo yagikoze. Uno mwaka kuva utanguye waranzwe n'icuka kibi hagati ya Amerika na Irani, kuva aho  Perezida Donald Trump  wa Amerika afatiye ingingo y'ukwiyonkora mu masezerano yasaba Irani guheba umugambi w'uguhingura ibirwanisho vy'ubumara, nayo igatezurirwa ibihano yafatiwe. Ibintu vyagiye gusubira kwunyuka igihe habereye ibitero vya drone n'ibisasu vya misile ku bigo bicukura igitoro vy'ahitwa Abqaiq na Khurais ku wa 14 z'uku kwezi kw'icenda. Abarwanya ubutegetsi bw'igihugu ca Yemen bitwa Houthi  nibo biyitiriye ico gitero, ariko Amerika na Arabia Saoudite - umwansi wa mbere wa Irani muri ako karere - vyagiriza Irani ko ari yo yagikoze, ivyo ico gihugu ciyamiriza civuye inyuma. Ijambo ryiwe yarishikirije mu birori vy'ukwibuka umunsi haduka intambara hagati ya Irani na Iraki yabaye kuva mu 1980 gushika mu 1988, ibirori vyaranzwe n'amadefire y'igisirikare ku mugwa mukuru wa Irani no mu bindi bisagara vy'igihugu. Mw'ijambo ryiwe ryaciye kumboneshakure y'ico gihugu yavuze ati: "Ingabo mvamahanga zishobora gutera ingorane n'umutekano muke ku banyagihugu bacu no mu karere kacu". Avuga ko muri kahise zateye akaga, akazisaba kuguma iwabo. "Nimba koko bafise umutima, ni bareke kugira akarere kacu ikiririmbiro ry'ibirwanisho … Uko muzogenda mureka kwivanga mu biraba akarere kacu n'ibihugu vyacu, niho numutekano uzogenda usasagara". Ubushikiranganji bw'ukwivuna abansi bwa Amerika, Pentagon, bwatangaje ku munsi wa gatanu ko buzorungika ingabo nkeya muri Arabia Saoudite kubera yabisavye, zikazoba ahanini zigizwe n'abajejwe kurwanira mu kirere be no gukinga ibitero vya misire. Umunyamabanga ajejwe kwivuna abansi, Mark Esper, avuga ati: "Tuzokora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo turungike mu maguru masha ibikoresho vya gisirikare". Iryo tangazo ryariyamirijwe cane n'igisata kijejwe gukingira ubutegetsi bwa ki isilamu, Revolutionary Guard Corps, igisata c'igisirikare ca Irani, gifatwa  na Amerika nk'umurwi w'iterabwoba. Umukuru w'ico gisata, Jenerali-Majoro Hossein Salami avuga ati: "Uwo ari we wese ashaka ko igihugu ciwe kiba ikiririmbiro ry'intambara, n'abandanye. Ariko muhagabire, agasotoro ntikazoguma ari agasotoro. Tuzokurikirana uwo ari we wese azodusotora".

column2: Arteta: Umumenyereza wa Arsenal afise umujinya inyuma y'aho Liverpool ibakubitiye 3-0 muhira
column3: Mikel Arteta avuga ko ari mu "mubabaro" akavuga ko ingene Arsenal yavyifashemwo mu gutsindirwa  muhira 3-0 na Liverpool ari "ibintu bidashobora kwihanganirwa". Uyu murwi w'Abarashi (The Gunners) nk'uko biyita warakubiswe bimwe bibi mu guterwa ibitsindo bitatu vyose mu gice ca kabiri c'urukino, Liverpool ikaba yarerekanye ko yisubije itoto inyuma y'imisi itari mike iri mu bibazo. Mu gihe hasigaye inkino umunani ngo ihiganwa rirangire, Arsenal iri inyuma amanota icenda yose kugira ngo ishobore gushika muri zine za mbere zifise uburenganzira bwo kuja muri rya higanywa rya Buraya rihuza imirwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo (Champions League/Ligue des Champions). Arteta ati: "Baradusumbije kabisa muri vyose. Vyose vyamvuyeko". "Turasaba imbabazi ku bantu baco n'abafana bacu". Arsenal, umurwi wigeze kuba rurangiranwa, uzwi ko mu mwaka wa 2003/2004 watsindiye ihiganwa utigeze utakaza urukino na rumwe, iri mu kibanza c'icenda mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza, biboneka ko amahirwe yonyene isigaranye kugira ngo ishobore kuja muri Champions League, ni uko itsindira ihiganwa rya Europa League. Arsenal iheruka gukina muri Champions League mu 2016/2017, kuva ico gihe irirabira kure. Ku wa kane, izokwakira umurwi Slavia Prague wo muri Tchéquie (canke République tchèque/ Czech Republic) mu rukino rwa mbere rw'igice ca kane gishira ica nyuma muri  Europa League. Arteta asaba abakinyi biwe guhagarara rugabo inyuma y'amarorerwa baraye bakorewe na Liverpool. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru inyuma y'urukino, Arteta yavuze ati: "Uno musi wari umubabaro mwinshi cane mu murwi. Ubu ndababaye cane kuko ni ibintu ntari niteze". "Ni ukuri ibi bintu ntibigasubire. Nishize mu kibanza c'umurwi n'abakunzi bawo, ibi ntibishobora kwihanganirwa. Ni ngombwa ko duhaguruka". "Ntegerezwa gukora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo nsubize ibintu mu buryo. Uno musi ibintu ntivyari vyifashe neza na gato". Jermaine Jenas,yahoze akina hagati muri Tottenham no mu murwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza aranegura ubuhinga Arteta yakoresheje. Ati: "Narorereye umurwi utari wizeye ubuhinga bwa Mikel Arteta". "Vyaboneka ko abakinyi ba Arsenal batari bamerewe neza. Basa n'uko ata shaka bari bafise ryo gukina canke ryo kurondera umupira canke ryo kurondera kwinjiza ibitsindo". "Ndiko ndibaza umubabaro abakunzi ba Arsenal bafise ubu". "Ni kangahe tubona Arsenal batakaza imipira inyuma bagaca batsindwa? Ubu ibintu bisigaye biteye isoni".

column2: Covax: Côte d'Ivoire na Ghana vyatanguye gutanga incanco zo gukinga Covid
column3: Ibihugu vya Africa vyatanguye gutera  incanco za Covid zatanzwe biciye ku rwego rwo gukora kugira incanco zisabikanywe kw'isi ata buryarya. Cote d'Ivoire ni kimwe mu bihugu vyaronkejwe izo ncanco zitangwa n'urwego rushigikiwe na ONU COVAX, aho gucanca  kwatanguye ku wa mbere. Na Ghana izotanguza isekeza ryo gucanca muri iyi ndwi. Umukuru wa Ghana, Nana Akufo-Addo kuri uyu wa mbere niwe yabaye uwa mbere mu kuronka urwo rucanco rwa coronavirus ruciye muri iyo nzira. Akufo-Addo yahimirije abanyagihugu kwiteza incanco no kwirinda abashira  amakenga kuri iyo gahunda, izotuma hasohoka incanco ibihumbi 600 za Oxford-AstraZeneca mu gihugu cose kuva ku wa kabiri. Yavuze ati: "Ni ngombwa ko ntanga akarorero ko uru rucanco ata ngorane ruteye mu kuba uwa mbere mu kuruhabwa,kugira uwari we wese muri Ghana yumve ko atekaniwe mu kuruterwa". Mu ntango hazobanza kuvurwa abafise amahirwe mabi menshi yo kwandura-abarenza imyaka 60 canke basanganywe izindi ndwara - hamwe n'abakozi ba nkenerwa cane, nk'abo kwa muganga, abigisha, abaporisi mbere n'abamenyeshamakuru bamwe bamwe. Ariko abagore bafise inda n'abari munsi y'imyaka 18 ntibarabwa n'iryo sekeza ryo gucandaga. Abategetsi bavuga ko badafise amakuru akwiye ku ngaruka z'urwo rucanco kuri iyo migwi y'abantu. Muri Cote d'Ivoire, isanganywe gahunda nk'iyo yo muri Ghana, ku wa mbere mu gitondo abantu bari batanguye gutonda imirongo ku bituro vyo gucandaga kugira bahabwe urucanco rwa mbere rwa AstraZeneca. Nigeria yiteze kuronka incanco zingana hafi miriyoni zine imbere y'uko iyi ndwi ihera. Professeur Gavin Yamey, yagize uruhara mu kwubaka umugambi wa Covax, yavuze ko bikenewe cane ko hatangwa incanco kw'isi yose. Ati: "Vyari bibabaje kubona ingene ibihugu bitunze cane cane bisakumba, "Vyari vyacitse nko kwikwegerako, gutanganwa, kandi ivyo si ukuba ari bibi gusa, ni n'akaga ku magara y'abantu." Gahunda zo gucandaga zaratevye gutangura muri Africa, ariko uwo mugabane w'isi  hagaragaye ibitigiri bito  vy'abanduye n'abapfuye ugereranije n'ibihugu vy'i Buraya. Umugambi wa Covax wizeye gutanga incanco zingana na miliyaridi 2 ku bantu bo mu bihugu 190 mu kiringo kidashika umwaka.

column2: Nkundabantu : umuririmvyi Ndoreyicimpa Bernard yari nde?
column3: Ejo ku wa gatandatu niho umuririmvyi Ndoreyicimpa Bernard yaririmbana na mugenziwe Alfred Nyandwi,  yitaba Imana i Bujumbura. Abo baririmvyi babiri bari bagize umurwi abatari bake bari bazi nka "Alfred na Bernard", bakaba bagiye kumenyekana cane ku rukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere rwiswe NKUNDABANTU. Alfred ati: " Nsigaranye umubabaro udasanzwe kuko yari umugenzi twari tumaranye imyaka n'imyaka, twavuye kure dufatana urugendo rwari rutugejeje aho tugeze, none ansize ndi umwe". Abo baririmvyi bompi basanzwe bava mu miryango y'abacuraranzi ba kera, banaririmvye indirimbo zamenyekanye cane. Bernard Ndoreyicimpa, mwene Mijuriro Mathias  na Ntahonkuriyer Valerie yavutse mu 1986, avukira muri Komine Isare ku mutumba wa Gishingano uhanamiye igisagara ca Bujumbura. Co kimwe na mugenziwe Alfred, Bernard yavukiye mu muryango w'abacuraranzi bahoze mbere baririmba mu murwi w'igihugu wari uzwi nka NAKARANGA. Alfred yabwiye BBC ati: "Uretse ko turi abavyara, twempi tuva mu miryango y'abacuraranzi, kuko papa wanje yakorana na se wa Bernard muri Nakaranga, n'aho bamaze gukukuruka". Se wiwe, Mijuriro Mathias yararirimvye indirimbo abatari bake bibuka nk'izitwa "Abanywa inzoga twaragowe", "Mariya Makurata", "Akarimi", "Musore uri muhira", n'izindi. Alfred Nyandwi yabwiye BBC ko batanguye kuvuza umuziki bari hamwe mu mwaka wa 1998 mu gihe bari bahungiye mu gisagara kubera intambara z'urutavanako zari iwabo mu Gishingano. Avuga ko batanguye kuririmbira mw'ibarabara mu ntumbero yo kurondera ingene bobaho inyuma y'aho ibintu vyabo binyagiwe, n'amazu yabo akabomorwa n'intambara. Ati:  "Ariyo mpamvu twaciye dufata umwuga wo kuririmbira mw'ibarabara, tuvugiriza abantu mw'ibarabara kugira ngo baduhe udufaranga, eka mbere twaranavugiriza n'indya kugira ngo dushobore kubaho". Avuga ko babaye muri ubwo buzima mu kiringo kitari gito, gushika aho buke buke batangura kuza baraja kuvugiriza mu bunywero mu bibanza bikomakomeye vy'i Bujumbura cane cane biri ku nkengera y'ikiyaga Tanganyika, nka za Saga Plage, Petit Bassam n'ahandi. Ati: "Aho hose twavugiriza mu bubare tuvugiriza ingenzi, abantu bari mu karuhuko bakaduha udufaranga duke duke, maze tugashobora kuronka ico dutanga mu miryango yacu kuko twari tukiri abana". "Twatanguye turi nk'abantu bita aba 'mendiants', ba ntahonikora". Alfred avuga ko batanguye kwinjira muri Studio mu 2006, babifashijwemwo na Tanganyika Studio, baca bategura urukurikirane rwabo rwa mbere rwabaye rurangiranwa biciye cane cane mu maradiyo. Urwo rukurikirane rwiswe NKUNDABANTU  rwabatumye bamenyekana cane, runabashikana mu bihugu bitari bike harimwo za DR Congo, Rwanda, Congo Brazzaville, Uganda, Kenya, Cameroun, Benin, Tchad,  Chine na  Brésil. Bernard apfuye be na mugenziwe Alfred bariko bategura gusohora urukurikirane rwabo rwa kabiri bari barahejeje gutunganya, bise BIRATANGAJE, bakaba bategura kurusohora muri uno mwaka wa 2020. Nta wuramenya icamwishe ariko Alfred avuga ko yari amaze ikiringo c'amezi umunani agendana indwara, akaba yapfuye ejo ku wa gatandatu bamutwaye kwa muganga.

column2: Gasape: Urubuga hwaniro rwa mbere rutangujwe n'Umurundi
column3: Umurundi Saxe Perry Gateka asanzwe arongoye Radio Humuriza FM aheruka gutanguza urubuga hwaniro, rushobora kuba ari rwo rwambere rutangujwe n'umuntu ava muri ico gihugu. Urwo rubuga rukora co kimwe n'izindi zisanzwe zimenyerewe nka Facebook canke Twitter, aho abarwiyandikishako basangira amakuru yanditse, amafoto canke za video, ku buryo bwihariye bagashirako n'amajwi. Aho yavugana na BBC, Saxe Perry yavuze yuko yashatse kugira urubuga hwaniro rukora nk'izindi zihasanzwe mbere ngo rukagira ico ruzirushije. Yagize ati: "... nagerageje kwihweza izindi mbuga dusanzwe dukoresha nka za Facebook n'izindi, mugabo nkabona ko ari ibintu bikomeye cane umuntu atoshikako. WhatsApp igiye kwibandaniriza n'impinduka n'aho uwu mugambi wayo wateye induru Australia yashyizeho itegeko ryo gutuma Google na Facebook biriha amakuru Biden, ikibazo kuri Zuckerberg na Facebook "... naragize ivyigwa vya multimedia mu buhinga bwa kure ngerageje kuri internet, hanyuma ntangura gukora kugira nshobore kwihanga abantu b'abanyamahanga... nagize nti nshaka kwipima ku bihangange vya kure bikomakomeye.." Abajijwe ico urwo rubuga rwiwe rusumvya izindi, Saxe Perry yatanze akarorero avuga ko ku zindi mbuga nka Facebook canke Youtube udashobora gushirako amajwi yonyene, ariko ku rubuga rwiwe Gasape ivyo ngo birashoboka. Ku basanzwe bakoresha  Facebook na Youtube, urashobora gushirako ifoto canke video, ariko amajwi yonyene ukwayo, atari kumwe n'amashusho, ntibikunda. Ku kibazo co kumenya abaza ku rubuga Gasabe abo ari bo n'ico baba barondera, Saxe Perry yavuze   yuko ataramemya neza abaruzako abo aribo. Yagize ati: "...[runo rubuga] rushobora kuba ruriko rurakoreshwa  n'abantu bari hafi ya miriyoni zitatu. Rero sinovuga ngo ni Abarundi gusa, ariko ico nizera ni uko benshi muri bo ari Abarundi. "Ariko usivye ko harimwo n'abanyamahanga kuko turamaze kubona abantu basaba nk'ivyo twita 'ama verification y'ama page yabo', tugasanga abaturungikiye ivyangombwa vyabo ni abazungu, ni abanyamahanga. "Rero novuga yuko muri rusangi ari abantu bari kw'isi yose barukoresha... sinagomvye ko runo rubuga rwitwa urw'Abarundi gusa, ni nayo mpamvu rutiswe Gasape.bi, rwiswe Gasape.com..." Saxe Perry yamye ari umwana akerebutse. Mu mwaka wa 2005, afise imyaka 14 y'amavuko, akoresheje utwuma atoraguye hirya no hino, yarahinguye insamirizi (radio transmitter), ico gihe aca atangura kumenyekana no gushika ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gihugu. Aho niho yahereye ashinga Radio Humuriza FM ubu yumvikana mu ntara zishika icenda zo mu Burundi. Radio Humuriza FM mbere yahavuye ikorana na BBC Gahuzamiryango, icemerewe gukorera mu Burundi, aho yaza iracisha amakuru yayo kuri Humuriza FM. Mu 2017 yatowe muri wa mugambi wa Young African Leaders aja muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, akarisha ubwenge mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye ari naho yakuye iciyumviro co gukora urubuga hwaniro. Agarutse yashinze Humuriza TV iboneka iciye ku buhinga bwa Facebook, uno mwaka naho rero akaba yatanguje urubuga hwaniro Gasape, ruboneka kuri internet co kimwe na application ija muri telephone ngendanwa. Saxe Perry avuga yuko ahanini mu bijanye n'uburyo akoresha yimenya, mu majambo yiwe akagira ati "jewe igihe cose namye ndya ikiremve ndacirasheko". Abandanya ati: "Nta muntu novuga ngo ariko aramfasha mu bijanye n'uburyo kuva ntangura runo rubuga kuko iyo mba nari mfise uburyo nari kurukora nko mu ndwi zibiri gusa." Yavuze yuko yamaze imyaka ibiri yegeranya uburyo yaba mu bijanye no kugura ama 'serveurs' canke kugura ibijanye n'umutekano kugira ntihagire abavogera urubuga rwiwe. Avuga kandi yuko mu gihe asanzwe arongoye ibitangazamakuru Humuriza FM na Humuriza TV, hari uburyo buboneka buvuye mu bamenyekanisha  ivyo bakora babicishije kuri ivyo bitangazamakuru.

column2: Amahasa yavutse mu nsoro zabitswe mu bukonje imyaka 30
column3: N﻿a  Sam Cabral BBC News Amahasa yavutse mu ntara ya Tennessee yo muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika avuye mu nsoro (urusoro: umwana akiri mu nda) zabitswe mu bukonje mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 30 iheze. Bifatwa ko ari insoro za mbere zimaze igihe kirekire zikavamwo ikiremwamuntu. Zabitswe mu bukonje bungana na -128C (ni ukuvuga ubushuhe bungana na 128C musi y’ubusa) mu mazi ya nitrogen (azote) ku wa 22 Ndamukiza (4) 1992. Rachel Ridgeway, nyina w’abana bane ava i Oregon, yibarutse aya mahasa ku wa 31 Gitugutu (10) uno mwaka. Se wabo, Philip Ridgeway, avuga ko ari ibisigabwenge. Lydia Ann na Timothy Ronald Ridgeway basa n’uko ari bo baciye umuhigo, nk’uko bivugwa n’ikigo National Embryo Donation Center (NEDC), ikigo cegamiye idini kivuga ko kimaze gufasha kuvyara impinja zirenga 1.200 zivuye mu nsoro zatanzwe n’abandi. Uwari amaze guca umuhigo afashijwe n’iki kigo NEDC, Molly Gibson, yavutse mu 2020 mu nsoro zabitswe mu bukonje mu kiringo c’imyaka hafi 27. Muganga John David Gordon yabitse izi nsoro avuga ati: "Iyi ngingo…yo kubika izi nsoro yohumuriza abibaza nimba hariho umuntu uwo ari we wese yoba yipfuza kwakira insoro bakoze inyuma y’imyaka 5, 10, 20 iheze”. "Inyishu ikomeye cane ni ego!" Izi nsoro z’amahasa zavuye mu mbuto zatanzwe n’umugabo n’umugore batazwi bari bubakanye, bakaba bategerezwa kuvyara hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa IVF (Fécondation in vitro/In vitro fertilization), ubuhinga bwo kuvyara bukorerwa hanze y’igitereko c’umugore. Umugabo yari mu myaka 50 akaba avugwa ko yahawe irigi n’umugore w’imyaka 34. Izi nsoro zabitswe mu bubiko bwa laboratoire ijejwe irondoka muri Amerika gushika mu 2007, igihe uyu muryango waziha ikigo NEDC muri Knoxville, Tennessee kugira ngo uwundi muryango uzikoreshe. Umuhinga mu bijanye n’insoro kw’ivuriro Southeastern Fertility ry’abubakanye ry’ikigo NEDC yaciye ayeyusha izi nsoro hanyuma azishira mu gitereko muri uno mwaka. Mw’itangazo, NEDC ivuga ko yizeye ko iyi nkuru ishobora “gutera intege abandi kugira ngo baronke aya mahirwe yo kwakira izi nsoro kugira ngo bashobore kuvyara”. Ni we mwana wa mbere umuryango wa Ridgeway - usanzwe ufise abandi bana bane bari hagati y’umwaka umwe n’imyaka umunani – baronse hakoreshejwe ubuhinga bwa IVF canke ku mbuto zitanzwe n’abagiraneza. Ari muhira mu muryango, Philip Ridgeway yabwiye imboneshakure CNN ati: "Nari mfise imyaka itanu igihe Imana iha ubuzima Lydia na Timothy, kandi yabandanije kuzigama ubwo buzima kuva ico gihe”. "Aha rero twovuga ko ari bo bana bacu bakuru, n’aho ari bo bana bacu bato”. Yongerako ati: "Muri ibi bintu harimwo igisigabwenge”.

column2: Umunsi wahariwe abagore: Mu Burundi ngo baraciye akenge ko kwishira hamwe
column3: Mu gihe isi yaraye ihimbaje umunsi mpuzamakungu wahariwe guharanira uburenganzira bw'abakenyezi n'iterambere ryabo, muri iyi ndwi turacihweza aho isemo igeze kuri iki kibazo c'uburinganire ku burenganzira hagati y'abagabo n'abagore. Mu Burundi, abagore ngo baramaze guca akenge ko kwishira hamwe mu migwi yo gukorera hamwe, bikabatuma kuronka umutahe no kugwiza umwimbu n'ubwo ibibazo bitabuze. Kimwe mu bibazo nyamukuru bisigaye ni ihohotera rifatiye ku gitsina, aho mu ntara zigera kuri 19, harangwa ibigo bitatu gusa bishobora kwakira no gufasha mu buryo bwa mbere abakorewe ayo mabi. Ariko rero ngo ibintu biriko birahinduka mu nzira nziza. Ivyo Florentine Kwizera yabibwiwe n'uwujejwe umugambi w'iterambere ridakumira mw'ishirahamwe ACORD Burundi, Mme Sophie Havyarimana (umviriza ikiganiro aho hejuru ukanze kw'ifoto)

column2: UN iragiriza u Burundi na Tanzania gutoteza impunzi z'abarundi
column3: Abahinga ba ONU bajejwe agateka ka zina muntu baratera akamo amareta y'Uburundi na Tanzania kwubahiriza uburenganzira bw'abasavye indaro muri ico gihugu. Bananebagura inkuru zivuga ko hariho impunzi zinyuruzwa, zisinzikarizwa ubuzima, zisubizwa mu Burundi ku nguvu zikongera zigaterwa n'ubwoba. ONU ivuga ko ivyo vyoba bikorwa n'inzego z'igipolisi n'iperereza vya Tanzania bafashanije n'iperereza ry'Uburundi. Bavuga bati : "Uretse amategeko akaze yo kubuza impunzi gucaruka, yashizweho na reta ya Tanzania, impunzi z'abarundi ubu zibayeho mu bwoba bwo kunyuruzwa mw'ijoro n'inzego zijejwe umutekano za Tanzania, zikajanwa mu bibanza batazi canke bagasubizwa mu Burundi. "Abayoboke b'imigambwe itavuga rumwe na reta bahungiye muri Tanzania boba babandanya gukurikiranwa iyo bahungiye." Abo bahinga bavuga kandi ko uko umutekano wifashe mu makambi bidahumuriza, uravye inkuru zivuga ko abajejwe iperereza mu Burundi, bihinduye impunzi, batunga urutoke abantu baba baronderwa, mu nyuma bagaca bahagarikwa n'inzego zijejwe umutekano za Tanzania. Basaba reta y'Uburundi guhagarika gutoteza abanyagihugu harimwo n'abo bariko bararondera gukingirwa n'amakungu mu gihugu ca Tanzania. Abo bahinga ba ONU bavuga bati : "Hari impunzi zemeje ko hari abatwarwa n'igipolisi ca Tanzania, bakanyuruzwa hanyuma bagasinzikarizwa ubuzima imbere y'uko birukanwa muri ico gihugu canke bategekwa gushira umukono ku rupapuro rwemeza ko bashaka gutahuka ku gushaka. "Bamwe babazwa kuvyerekeye kuba mu migwi igwana,  gutunga ibigwanisho, ibikorwa bakora mw'ikambi, rimwe na rimwe bakakwa amahera kugira barekurwe." Muri urwo rwandiko bavuga kandi ko bamwe mu mpunzi bishwe inyuma yo kunyuruzwa n'abajejwe umutekano ba Tanzania. Amakenga ku mutekano wabo, watumye bamwe mu mpunzi bemera gutaha, atari kugushaka ahubwo kubera ubwoba. Abo bahinga barangiza icegeranyo cabo bavuga ko bibabaje kubona kuva mu 2020 reta yavuze ko hari amatohoza ariko arakorwa ku bantu banyuruzwa, ariko gushika ubu akaba ata co arashikako. Reta ya Tanzania ngo irazi neza uko ivyo bintu vyifashe, ikaba isabwa kugira ico ikoze kugira bihagarare. Nta co reta y'Uburundi n'iya Tanzania bari bashikiriza ku mugaragaro kuri ibi vyashikirijwe n'abahinga ba ONU.

column2: China: Rurangiranwa mu kuvuza piano Li Yundi yapfunzwe yagirizwa kugura imaraya
column3: Rurangiranwa mu kuvuza piano mu Bushinwa, Li Yundi, apfunzwe azira gusambana n'imaraya, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru ca reta. Ku rubuga hwaniro, igipolisi canditse ko umugabo w'imyaka 39 hamwe n'imaraya y'imyaka 29, bemeye ko bakoze ibintu bitemewe n'amategeko. Bafashwe inyuma y'aho abanyagihugu batangiye iyo nkuru ku bategetsi. Mu gihe igipolisi kitashize ahabona izina ryiwe, ikinyamakuru ca reta mu nyuma cemeje ko ari Li. Iyo nkuru yababaje abakunzi benshi b'uwo mugabo azwi kw'izina rya "China Piano Prince". Ku myaka 18, Li yabaye umuntu wa mbere akiri muto avuza piano - ahawe agashimwe ka mbere gakomeye mpuzamakungu ka Chopin Piano Competition mu 2000. Yabandanije avuza piano hirya no hino kw'isi, akaba n'umuntu azwi cane mu bantu bavuga ururimi rw'igishinwa. Umuntu umwe yanditse ku rubuga hwaniro rwa Weibo rumeze nka Twitter ati:"Mana yanje, biratangaje. Uyu ni Li Yundi twese dutangarira?" Abandi berekana amakenga ku kuntu yafashwe. Undi yanditse ngo:"Mfise amakenga yo kumenya ingene abantu bamenye ko ari we. Ubonye umugabo w'imyaka 39 n'umugore w'imyaka 29 binjiye mu nzu bari kumwe, bigenda gute ngo abantu bamenye ko ari imaraya, na we ari umukiriya wiwe?" Inyuma y'aho iyo nkuru imenyekaniye, ishirahamwe ry'abanyamuziki mu Bushinwa ryavuze ko rigiye kwaka ubunywanyi Li kuko "atanga isura mbi cane mu bantu". Bamwe mu baraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko ipfungwa ryiwe rishobora gufatwa nk'igabishwa ku nyifato mbi y'abandi ba rurangiranwa mu gihe Ubushinwa bwahagurukiye abakora akazi kerekeye umuziki. Mu mategeko yo mu Bushinwa, abasambana canke bagurisha imaraya bashobora gupfungwa gushika ku misi 15 bakanatangisha n'amande ashobora gushika ku madolari ya amerika 782.

column2: Ibanki nkuru y’u Burundi igabisha amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga atisunze amategeko
column3: Umuyobozi w'igisata kijejwe kugenzura amabanki mw'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu c'u Burundi, Prosper Ngendanganya, asaba amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga kwubahiriza amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'umubonano hagati y'iyo banki n'amashirahamwe agura akagurisha amafaranga wabaye  ku munsi wa kane w'iyi ndwi mu ntumbero y'ukwibutsa ayo mashirahamwe amategeko mashasha n'igituma adakurikizwa. Ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kw'icenda uno mwaka, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa gatanu, bwana Ngendakumana yaragabishije ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Avuga ko ishirahamwe rizofatwa ririko riragurisha ibiciro ry'ishakiye ko rizofatwa nk'umwansi w'igihugu kandi ko rizohanwa hisunzwe igatabu mpanavyaha. Ibanki nkuru y'igihugu imenyesha kandi ko urudandazwa rutemewe n'amategeko (marché noir) rw'amafaranga y'agaciro rwasubiye kwibonekeza cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. BRB ikababazwa n'uko ayo mashirahamwe adashaka gufasha mu kwerekana abo badandaza bo mu kinyegero bakora batubahiriza ibiciro biba vyashinzwe na BRB. Mu rugamba rwo kurwanya urudandazwa ruteye kubiri n'amategeko, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu yaremereye agashirukabute umuntu azoshobora kwerekana ishirahamwe canke inzu izogura canke izogurisha amafaranga y'agaciro hatisunzwe iryo tegeko rishasha, aho azoronswa ibihumbi 500 vy'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ni mu gihe uwuzokwerekana umuntu canke ishirahamwe rikora ritazwi n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu nawe azorosnwa ibice 10 kw'ijana (10%) vy'amafaranga yose azoba afashwe. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kani amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

column2: Covid-19: Prezida wa Uganda Yoweri Museveni yitwariye ikinyamakuru Daily Monitor
column3: Prezida Yoweri Museveni wa Uganda yashengeje mu butungane ikinyamakuru cigenga Daily Monitor, akiziza kwandika inkuru ko we n'abamwegereye bahawe urucanco rwa Covid-19 mu mpisho. Daily Monitor casubiyemwo inkuru yanditswe n'ikinyamakuru Wall Street ko prezida Museveni n'abamwegereye bicandagishije mu mpisho Covid-19, imbere y'uko abandi banyagihugu baronka urwo rucanco. Ico kirego ca prezida yatanze muri sentare nkuru kivuga ko iyo nkuru y'ico kimenyeshamakuru yanditswe mu ntumbero yo kumukorera ikibi n'ibigirankana. Ico kirego kiravuga kandi ko iyo nkuru, yanditswe itariki 23 z'ukwezi kwa kabiri, cerekana prezida nk'umuntu atisonera yiha uburenganzira hamwe n'akagwi gafise amahigwe yo kuba kamwegereye, gucandagwa imbere y'abakozi bo muvyo amagara y'abantu bari imbere mu kugwanya ico kiza hamwe n'imigwi igeramiwe gusumba iyindi. Mw'ijambo yashikirije igihugu incuro zibiri zitandukanye mu ndwi zibiri ziheze, prezida Museveni yasavye ico kinyamakuru gusaba ikigongwe ku rupapuro rwa mbere rwaco. Ico kinyamakuru carisiguye kuri iyo nkuru mu ntango z'iyi ndwi. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ku mboneshakure ku musi w'Imana, prezida yavuze ko acihweza urucanco bokoresha muri nyinshi zimaze kwemezwa. Museveni yongeyeko ko ashaka ko ikirangamisi co gutanga incanco gitangurira ku bantu bageramiwe kurusha abandi, nk'abakozi bo muvyo amagara y'abantu. Uganda iramaze kuronka incanco 860.000 za AstraZeneca, kandi abantu barenga 4.000, benshi muri bo bari mbere mu kugwanya coronavirus, baramaze gucandagwa.

column2: Hari ibifungurwa bishobora kugabanya imyaka yawe yo kubaho n'ukukwononera amagara
column3: Urashobora kuvuga ubudasa buri hagati y'ibifungurwa bihingurwa buke buke n'ibindi vyaciye mu mahinguriro cane? Burya birateye ikibazo? Ijambo 'guhingura ibifungurwa'  rifise insiguro mbi muri iki gihe ca vuba, hari ivyigwa vyakozwe mu Bufaransa no muri Espagne vyerekana ko izo mfungurwa ataco zongera mu mubiri kandi zituma umuntu agabanya igihe co kubaho. Ubwo bushakashatsi bwerekanye ko abantu barya ibifungurwa bitegurigwa  mu mahinguriro incuro zine ku musi mu kiringo c'imyaka cumi bafise impungenge zo gupha zigera  kuri  mirongo itandatu na kabiri kw'ijana ugereranije n'abandi bafungura agace kamwe canke dukeyi ku musi. Izindi ngaruka mbi z'ibifungurwa bitekeye bikorerwa mu mahinguriro ni urugero runini rwo kugwara umutima canke uguhagara kw'umutima canke isanganya ry'udutsi dusoza ubwenge  bivuye ku ngwara y'umurindi w'amaraso urenze. Naho biruko, mu bihugu bimwe nk'Ubwongereza, abanyagihugu baronka ivyunyunyu birenga mirongo itanu kw'ijana biva ku bifungurwa bikorerwa mu mahinguriro. None twomenya gute ibifungurwa biteye ubwoba tugaheza tukamenya gafungura neza? Biragoye kumenya ibibigize rimwe na rimwe: Ibifungurwa nk'umukate n'iforomaje vyose bifatwa ko bitegurigwa mu mahinguriro ariko ntibitanga impanuka zimwe ku buzima. Igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu muri Kaminuza ya Sao Paulo muri Bresile gishira ibifungurwa mu migwi ine. Iyi migwi iva ku bifungurwa bidahingurwa gushika ku bihingurwa cane. Uyu mugwi ugizwe n'ibifungurwa bidahingurwa na gato canke bihingurwa buke buke imbere yo gufungurwa, bigizwe n'ingaburo nk'amavitamine, ivyorosha mu nda n'ivyunyunyu. Uyu mugwi ugizwe n'ivyamwa bihiye, ibibogaboga, ibiyoba, intete, ibiharage, n'ibindi bifungurwa biva mu bikoko nk'amagi, amafi n'amata. Ibifungurwa vyahinduwe gatoyi bishobora kuba vyumye, vyoroshe cane , bishuhije buke buke ,  bikanye canke   ariko bitarimwo ibirungo. Murivyo harimwo kandi ivyamwa n'ibibogaboga bibisi, ifi mbisi  n'amata akanye  bizwi neza ko bitagiramwo isukari, amata, ipiripiri hamwe n'ibiboga vyumye. Ibifungurwa bitekeshejwe ibirungo harimwo amavuta, ayavyibusha nk'ayinka, vinegeri, isukari n'umunyu. Ntibivuga ko ibifungurwa nk'ivyo biribwa ukwavyo canke ari vyinshi cane, ariko kenshi biriribwa mu mugwi w'ibindi bifungurwa. Ibifungurwa bihingurwa bigizwe kenshi n'umugwi wongerwamwo ikirungo kimwe canke bibiri. Murivyo harimwo ibibabugwa nk'inyama y'impene, ingurube, umukate, ibiyoba birimwo umunyu canke isukari, ivyamwa birimwo inzoga cankeumuvinyu. Intumbero nyamukuru yo guhingura ibifungurwa ni kwongereza ikiringo bishobora kumara canke gukomeza akanovera cavyo. Ibifungurwa bihingurwa cane kenshi na kenshi birimwo ibirungo utoshobora kwongeramwo uri muhira uriko urabitegura. Ntushobora kubimenya amazina yavyo kubera birimwo ubumara, biriko amabara, ubusose canke ibindi bibikingira. Vyinshi mu bifungurwa bihingurwa cane biribwa n'abantu baba mu mu bihugu bitunze cane kw'isi ni: Igihe cose raba inyandiko ziri  ku gifungurwa: ibirungo bitandukanye na cane cane mugihe ibintu bikoreshwa mu mahinguriro akora ibifungurwa ategerezwa kwandika ko ibifungurwa vyahinguwe cane. Urwo rwandiko rushobora kubako ibirungo vyakoreshejwe birenga nka bitanu, nk'uko bivugwa n'umwigisha wa Kaminuza Maira Bes-Rastrollo, ari mu bakoze ico cigwa. Ibirungo bitaboneka bishobora kuba bihindura akanovera k'ico  gifungurwa. Vyinshi murivyo nta ngorane bitera ariko biravugwa ko bifise ingaruka mbi. Ni ukuraba neza ivyanditseko  ko vyerekana urugero rw'ivyunyunyu bivyibusha, isukari, ko umunyu ari  mwinshi, ugereranye canke ari mukeyi. Iyi nkuru yateguwe n'igisata ca BBC kijejwe ivy'ibifungurwa.

column2: U Burundi ngo naho atawurwaye coronavirus arahaboneka "buriteguye"
column3: Icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burundi, Gaston Sindimwo, yabwiye BBC ko ico gihugu citeguye kurwanya coronavirus naho ata wanduye uwo mugera arahaboneka. U Burundi ni kimwe mu bihugu bike kw'isi gushika uyu munsi hataraboneka umugwayi wa coronavirus. Ariko mu ntumbero yo kuzitira bataronerwa, leta yaramaze gufata ingingo zo gukumira ico kiza. Muri izi harimwo guhimiriza abantu kudafata ingendo, baba abinjira mu gihugu canke abashaka gusohoka hamwe no guhagarika uruja n'uruza rw'indege mu kiringo c'iminsi indwi. Basaba kandi abanyagihugu kwirinda kwegerana aho bishoboka, ndetse no gukoranako. Icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu Gaston Sindimwo yadusobanuriye ko ari nayo mpamvu mu nama nshikiranganji y'uno munsi baramukanije badakorana mu ntoke nk'uko bimenyerewe. Yagiranye ikiganiro na Florentine Kwizera, ushobora kwumva aho hejuru.

column2: Urukino rwa Arsenal-Manchester City ntirwerekanwa kuri TV y'Ubushinwa kubera Mesut Ozil
column3: Televiziyo y'Ubushinwa CCTV yafashe ingingo y'ukutekerana urukino rwa Arsenal na Manchester City inyuma y'amajambo yashikirijwe n'umukinyi wa Arsenal Mesut Ozil, nk'uko bimenyeshwa n'ikinyamakuru ca leta. Mu butumwa yacishije ku rubuga hwaniro, Ozil yariyamirije ugufatwa nabi kw'aba Isilamu bo mu karere ka Uighur mu Bushinwa. Umurwi wa Arsenal wasohoye itangazo aho witandukanya n'amajambo yavuzwe n'uyo mukinyi akomoka mu Budagi, uvuga ko "ari ishirahamwe ridaharanira inyungu za politike". Ikinyamakuru c'u Bushinwa The Global Times  cavuze ko ayo majambo ya Ozil ari "ibinyoma" kandi ko "yahemukiye" abajejwe urukino rw'umupira w'amaguru. Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bushinwa ryamenyesheje ko ivyavuzwe na Ozil "bidashobora kwihanganirwa" kandi ko yababaje "abakunzi ba Arsenal" mu Bushinwa. CCTV yaciye ifata ingongo yo kwerekana urukino rwa Tottenham na Wolves, aho kwerekana urukino rwa Arsenal iza kwakira Man City isanzwe ifise igikombe c'ihiganwa ry'u Bwongereza. Muri ayo majambo yacishije ku rubuga hwaniro, Ozil, asanzwe ari umunywanyi w'idini rya Isilamu, yavuze ko aba isilamu ba Uighur ari "abarwanyi bariko barwanya ihohotera bakorerwa". Aranegura kandi Ubushinwa n'abandi ba Isilamu avuga ko bigira sindabibazwa ku ngorane abo ba Isilamu barimwo. Ubushinwa bubandanya buhakana ko butariko burahohotera aba Isilamu ba Uighur. Amashirahamwe aharanira agateka ka muntu avuga ko abantu bababa umuliyoni - hafi bose bagizwe n'aba Isilamu ba Uighur - bapfungiwe mu mabohero acungerewe cane kandi ata rubanza baciriwe. Ubushinwa buvuga ko ahubwo bari mu bigo aho bariko bahabwa inyigisho ngo bashobore  kurwanya indyane zishingiye ku madini. Mu kwezi kw'icumi, ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaboko rya Amerika, NBA, ryarahuye n'ibibazo vy'ubutunzi inyuma y'aho umwe mu barongoye imirwi ya NBA yandikiye amajambo ku rubuga ntangamakuru yatosekaje imigenderanire n'Ubushinwa. Daryl Morey, umukuru w'umurwi Houston Rockets, yanditse kuri Twitter avuga ko ashigikiye imyiyerekano y'ukurondera ubwigenge muri Hong Kong. Ayo majambo yatumye amakompanyi y'Ubushinwa ahagarika imfashanyo zayo  be n'amasezerano yerekeye kwerekana inkino z'umupira w'amaboko ku ma televiziyo.

column2: Papa Francis ati: 'Imana idukunda twese, n’aho woba uri umunyakibi ruhebwa'
column3: Papa Francis yahimbaje umunsi mukuru wa Noel avuga ko Imana idukunda twese - "Ninkozi z'ibibi ruhebwa". Yashikirije iryo jambo imbere y'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari mu gisabisho c'ijoro rya Noel kw'isengero rikuru i Vaticano ryitiriwe Umutakatifu Petero. Ati: "Ufise kuba  uri mu vyiyumviro bibi, ufise kuba warakoze ibi ruhebwa…ariko Imana ibandanya igukunda". Hari bamwe babona ko yashikirije ayo majambo afatiye ku mabi yagirizwa bamwe mu barongoye Ekleziya Katolika, harimwo ibijanye n'ugufata ku nguvu, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC. Mu masaha yo ku mugoroba, Papa Francis aza gusubira mw'iyo sengero y'Umutakatifu Petero i Vaticano aho nk'uko vyama aza gushikiriza isi yose ijambo rya Papa risanzwe ryitezwe. Mu bitavye iyo misa harimwo abana batowe mu bihugu, harimwo nka za Venezuela, Irak na Uganda. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC i Roma, Mark Lowen, avuga ko vyerekana ko Papa afise ku mutima abakatolika baharurwa mu muliyaridi 1 n'ibice bitatu kw'isi, ashimikiye cane cane ku ngorane zihanze abimukira n'abari mu ntambara kw'isi yose. Uyo mu papa w'imyaka 83 akomoka muri Argentine yavuze ati: "Noel itwibutsa ko Imana ibandanya itwereka urukundo idufitiye, n'aho twoba turi abanyavyaha ruhebwa. Kuri jewe, ku muntu uwo ari we wese, uno munsi itubwira iti: 'Ndagukunda kandi nzokwama ndagukunda, kuko mu maso yanje uri ngirakamaro'". Imana ntigukunda kubera wiyumvira ugakora ivyiza. Igukunda ataco irabiyeko, vyonyene gusa. Urukundo rwayo ntiruva ku kungene umeze". Papa yanacishijemwo n'ibijanye n'amabi avugwa muri Ekleziya, hamwe n'isesagurwa ry'umutungo wa Ekleziya. Ati: "Nimba hari ibitagenda neza mu buzima bwacu, nimba hari ibitagenda neza muri Ekleziya, n'aho hoba ibibazo bimeze gute kw'isi, ivyo ntibizotubera inyendamuvano". Kuva mu bisagara vya Australia gushika mu mashure muri Irlande eka mbere no mu bisagara vya Amerika, Ekleziya Katolika yarahuye n'ibibazo vy'abayirongoye bagirizwa gufata ku nguvu abana kuva mu myaka mirongo iheze. Hari ibirego bikomeye n'abantu batanga ivyemezo vy'ivyo vyaha vyavuzwe cane mu matohoza abandanya akorwa. Mu biheruka, umukardinali wa Australia George Pell yarakubiswe intahe mu gahanga na sentare ko yafashe ku nguvu uduhungu tubiri two mu gisagara ca Melbourne muri Australia mu 1996. Uyo mukardinali yanahoze ajejwe ubutunzi i Vaticano - bisigura ko yaboneka nk'umutegetsi agira gatatu muri Ekleziya - niwe mutegetsi mukuru wa Ekleziya muri Australia yagirijwe ico caha. Mu ndwi iheze, Papa yarakoze impinduka zikomeye cane mu guhindura ibijanye "n'ibanga ry'ubupapa" ryatumye ivyo guhohotera abana vyakorwa n'abategetsi ba Ekleziya bisasirwa indava muri kahise. Imbere y'aho, Ekleziya yaragira ibanga ibijanye n'ugufata abana ku nguvu, mu vyafatwa ko kwari ukugerageza kugumiriza ibanga ababikorewe n'ababikoze. Ariko, ingingo nshasha yarakuyeho izo nzitizi zahora zibuza abantu kumenyesha ivyababayeko, canke ababibakoreye. Papa Francis agize iminsi atoroherezwa kuko hari benshi bamusaba gufata ingingo ruhasha kugira ngo arwanye ako kabi kiziziye Ekleziya muri ino myaka ya vuba.

column2: Papa Francis: Gatolika yakoze amakosa mu "gucinyiza imico y'abandi"
column3: Umwungere wa Elkeziya Gatolika, Papa Francis, yavuze ko iryo shengero ryakoze amakosa mu gushimikira ku muco umwe gusa, rimwe na rimwe hakanakoreshwa inguvu mu gushika ku mugambi waryo Papa yavuze yuko ivyo vyahombeje Ishengero ubutunzi butandukanye bwo mu mico n'imigenzo myinshi. Yavuze yuko inyigisho z'ishengero zerekanye yuko hakwiye kwubahirizwa "inkomoko y'umuco n'akaranga vya buri muntu." Ivyo Papa Francis yabivugiye mu mubonano rusangi uba buri wa gatati i Vaticano. Abivuze mu gihe hari umwidogo ku mugabane wa Amerika y'ubumanuko ku vyagizwe igihe Espagne yigarurira ico gice c'isi ikanashira mu bukoroni ba kavukire baho. Kuwa kabiri umukuru w'igisagara ca Mexico mu gihugu ca Mexique yavuze yuko igishusho c'umugore kavukire kizosubirira ica Christopher Columbus (afatwa nk'uwatoye aho umugabane wa Amerika uri) muri kimwe mu bice bikomeye vy'uwo muji.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: De Jong, Werner, Fofana, Barnes, Firmino, Gueye
column3: Chelsea igiye kurondera umukinyi akina hagati wa Barcelona umunya-Hollande Frenkie de Jong w’imyaka 25, kandi mu gihe yoramuka avuye Nou Camp, uyu murwi wo muri Espagne ushobora guca urondera umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester City, umunya-Portugal Bernardo Silva w’imyaka 27. (Sport – mu ki Espagnol) Umumenyereza wa Barcelona  Xavi avuga ko atazi nimba De Jong, asanzwe aronderwa cane na Manchester United, azoguma muri uyo murwi w’ihiganwa ry’umupira w’amaguru rya Espagne, La Liga, muri rino ci. (Metro) Chelsea iriko iragerageza kurondera umukinyi w’inyuma wa Leicester City umufaransa Wesley Fofana w’imyaka 21,hamwe n’umunya-Hollande akina inyuma na we nyene Denzel Dumfries w’imyaka 26 asanzwe akinira  Inter Milan. (Athletic). Chelsea yemeye guha Real Madrid yo muri Espagne umusatirizi w’umudagi Timo Werner  w’imyaka 26. (Marca) Newcastle United iriko irakurikirana umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Leicester City umwongereza Harvey Barnes w’imyaka 24, inyuma y’aho uyu murwi uzwi nka Foxes wankiye igiciro yari yemeye gutanga kuri mugenziwe James Maddison w’imyaka 25 akina hagati. (Mail) Umusatirizi wa Liverpool Roberto Firmino araronderwa na Juventus ariko uyu munya-Brezili w’imyaka 30 avuga ko yipfuza kwigumira i Anfield. (Liverpool Echo) Umukinyi w’inyuma, umunya-Hollande Virgil van Dijk w’imyaka 31 avuga ko mugenziwe bakinana muri Liverpool, Mohamed Salah w’imyaka 30 ashobora kuba yaragizweko ingaruka n’ibiganiro ku vyerekeye amasezerano yiwe mu mwaka w’inkino uheze, ariko ko ubu “akina ata bibazo biri mu mutwe” inyuma yo gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha. (Liverpool Echo) Everton irabandanya ibiganiro na Paris St-Germain mu ntumbero yo guheraheza amasezerano azotuma umunya-Senegal akina hagati Idrissa Gueye w'imyaka 32, asubira muri Goodison Park. (Times) Manchester United iriko iraraba ingene yoronka umusatirizi wa Stuttgart umunya-Autriche Sasa Kalajdzic w’imyaka 25, be n’umunya Slovenia Benjamin Sesko w’imyaka 19 akina imbere muri Red Bull Salzburg, mu gihe kazoza ka Cristiano Ronaldo i Old Trafford kadatomoye. (Mail) Umukinyi w’inyuma ku ruhande rw’ibubamfu muri RB Leipzig Angelino w’imyaka 25, ni we ashobora kuvuvudukirwa na Barcelona mu gihe yonanirwa no kugura mugenziwe wa Espagne Marcos Alonso w’imyaka 31 asanzwe akinira Chelsea. (Sport – muki Espagnol) Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Bayern Munich Oliver Kahn yari aherutse kuvuga ko umusatirizi wa Tottenham umwongereza Harry Kane yari "indoto ya kazoza ", avuga ko uyu murwi wo mu Budagi ata mugambi ufise wo kugura uyu musatirizi. (90 Min) Roma yarondeye umusatirizi w’umutaliyano Andrea Belotti w’imyaka 28, asanzwe yirebanga inyuma yo kuva muri Turin/Torino muri rino ci. (Football Italia)

column2: Abaguzi b'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi mu Burundi basaba guhumurizwa
column3: Nyuma y'aho leta ivugiye ko atacatitutse mu buryo ishirahamwe Brarudi rihingura ibinyobwa vyaryo, ababifata amakenga ntarahera kuko akanovera katakiri kakandi. Ikigo ca leta y'u Burundi kijejwe kugenzura ubuziranenge bw'ibidandazwa, BBN giheruka kumenyesha ko naho akanovera k'ibinyobwa vya Brarudi koba katakiri nka mbere, ngo ntacatitutse ku buryo bihingurwa. Ariko abafata ivyo binyobwa ntibashize amakenga, imyidogo ikaba ikiri ya yindi mu gihe bobo bafashe ivyo binyobwa bumva neza ko "bitakiryoshe" nka mbere. Haca rero haza umwitwarariko wo kumenya niba ivyo binyobwa bisa n'ivyahindutse ata ngaruka vyobagirako naho leta isa n'iyihumuriza. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abaguzi mu Burundi, Pierre Nduwayo, yabwiye BBC ko vyumvikanye ko ivyo binyobwa bifise icahindutse. Yagize ati: "Biboneka mu nzoga, twaratanguye kuvyumva cane cane nko muri za Royale (Amstel), hamwe n'amafana. "Ivyo n'imbere y'uko umushikiranganji abishikiriza imyidogo y'abaguzi twari tumaze kuyumva. Kandi na twebwe ubisomye urumva ko akanovera kahahora gasa n'akahindutse." Bwana Nduwayo yabandanije avuga ko Brarudi mu bisanzwe yahora inyaruka mu gushikiriza ibijanye n'ibinyobwa vyayo ariko ko ubu ataco iravuga. Yagize ati: "Brarudi twari dusazanzwe tuzi ko ari ishirahmwe rikunda kuza riramenyesha ibintu vyabo aho bihagaze n'ubwo hoba hari ingorane bakazishikiriza. "Ariko kuva iyo myidogo itanguye bari mu gacerere ntangere, ni naco gituma twovuga duti ahubwo nibave muri ako gacerere  bashikirize nabo kuri ayo magenga abaguzi boba bafise..." Uwo aserukiye abaguzi yabandanije avuga ko naho leta ivuga ko ata ngorane zihara, akanovera gafise akamaro kanini mu gutuma abaguzi bahurumbira ikidandazwa ico ari co cose. Rero ngo naho boba bababwira ko ata ngorane kandi bumva ako kanovera karahindutse, ntibibuza ko bagira amakenga.

column2: Yegereyegere "Kwa Siyoni": Abajejwe iryo soko ntibavuga rumwe n'abarikoreramwo
column3: Abadandariza mw'isoko rya Bujumbura City Market rizwi nko kwa Siyoni barahagaritse ibikorwa vyabo kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri biyamiriza iduzwa ry'amahera yo kuriha ibibanza bakoreramwo  gushika ku ncuro zibiri. Ariko abajejwe iryo soko, bavuga yuko ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe uravye ibihe tugezemwo n'uburyo bwakoreshejwe mu kuvugurura isoko. Umupfasoni umwe muri abo badandaza bavuganye na BBC atashimye kwivuga izina, avuga ko bandikiwe amakete abamenyesha ko kuva itariki 10 z'ukwezi kwa mbere 2022 amahera bahora bariha yadugijwe incuro zibiri. Agira ati: "Batumenyesheje ko kubera ibikorwa vyakozwe muri iryo soko, ko kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere amahera twahora turiha azohinduka. Akarorero abahora bariha ibihumbi 400 ku kwezi bazoriha ibihumbi 750, abahora bariha na bo 188.800 bakazoriha 312.000. Urumva ko bagwijije incuro zibiri zirenga." Ivyo bikorwa bivugwa vyakozwe ngo ni nko kwubaka ahahagarara imiduga, gusiga isima hasi hamwe n'amabombo (robine) azana amazi mu ntumbero yo kwikingira ikiza Covid-19. Abadandariza muri  iyo soko bavuga ko batanka ko ibiciro vyoduga, ariko bagasaba ko habanza kuba inama n'ingingo. BBC yashoboye kuvugana n'uburongozi bw'iryo soko, uwitwa Joseph Dukundane atubwira yuko baravye igihe cari kihaciye amahera ataduzwa kandi ibintu vyarazimvye, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyo kuvugurura isoko baranguye, ngo ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe: Kanda ngaha wumve ico kiganiro.

column2: Umugambi wa UK wo kurungika abimukira mu Rwanda uteye kubiri 'na kamere y'Imana' - Welby
column3: Umukuru w'ishengero ry'Ubwongereza (Church of England), Justin Welby, kuri uyu wa Mungu yaneguye umugambi wa Reta y'Ubwongereza wo kurungika mu Rwanda abarondera ubuhungiro. Uyu Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury avuga ko uwu mugambi "uteye kubiri na kamere y'Imana". Mu nyigisho yiwe ya Pasika, Justin Welby yavuze ko igihe c'izuka rya Yesu Kristu/Yesu Kristo atari ico "kuremeka inshingano zacu abandi". Reta ivuga ko ari ngombwa ko haba impinduka kugira bakingire ubuzima bw'abantu ntibagurishwe.l Muri uwu mugambi w'imiriyoni 120 z'amapadundi (hafi imiriyoni 157 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika)  - watangajwe muri ino ndwi - abantu bafatwa ko binjiye mu Bwongereza bidaciye mu mategeko bazotwarwa muri iki gihugu c'Urwanda, ari ho bazokwemererwa gusabira uburenganzira bwo kuja kuba muri ico gihugu. Iyi ngingo iriyamirizwa bikomeye, aho amashirahamwe atabara abatishoboye arenga 160 ariko asaba abashikiranganji guhagarika ico bita poritike "y'ubugome". Eka n'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi mu Bwongereza na bamwe mu bagendera ku vyiyumviro vya kera (Conservatives) baranegura iyi ngingo. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ku Rusengero rukuru rwa Canterbury kuri uno musi wa Mungu wa Pasika, Musenyeri Welby yavuze ko  hari "ibibazo bikomeye bitewe n'irungikwa ry'abasaba ubuhungiro mu mahanga". Yongerako ati: "Ibisigaye ni ivya poritike n'abanyaporitike. Ica ngenderwako n'uko vyoba ari vyiza mu maso y'Imana. Ariko siko bimeze. " ...kandi ntibihuye n'inshingano zacu nk'igihugu kigendera ku ndangagaciro k'aba-Kristu: kuko kuremeka abandi inshingano zacu, naho hoba ari ku gihugu kirondera ineza nk'Urwanda, ni igihushane ca kamere k'Imana, kuko yo nyene ubwayo yaremeye kwiremeka ibitunanira". Ubushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati yashigikiye uwu mugambi bufatiye ku majambo yo kunegura yavuzwe n'uyu musenyeri, bukavuga ko Ubwongereza "bwishimira kahise kabwo" ko gufasha abo bose babikeneye, kandi ko n'imigambi yo guha ubuhungiro ababukeneye wafashije ibihumbi amajana n'amajana kuronka "inzira nziza kandi zemewe n'amategeko zo kwubaka kazoza kabo". Umuvugizi w'ubwo bushikiranganji avuga ati: "Hagati aho, isi irahanzwe n'ikibazo c'abimukira ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho rero hakenewe impinduka kugira ngo abantu babi bashora abantu bareke gushira ubuzima bw'abantu mu kaga hanyuma n'ikibazo c'abarondera ubuhungiro kw'isi cananiraye gitorerwe umuti". Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati buvuga ko Urwanda "rutekanye" kandi ko ruzokwiga abasaba ubuhungiro hisunzwe amategeko mpuzamakungu akingira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu. Amasendika y'abakozi ba reta avuga ko iyi ngingo ari "iy'ubunyamaswa" ariko ko abategetsi bazotegerezwa kuyishira mu ngiro canke naho bakagenda. Ku wa kane, Ubwongereza n'Urwanda vyashize ahabona amasezerano mashasha azotuma bamwe mu barondera ubuhungiro bazoronswa gusa itike y'indege yo kugenda bakaja muri ico gihugu.
